Sentencas: A novel LSB-doped GDC (LGDC) electrolyte has been developed.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of LSB-doped GDC electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 (GDC) and Bi0.775La0.225O1.5 (LSB) have been synthesized by a citric acid-nitrate sol-gel method and a conventional solid-state reaction method, respectively.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of LSB-doped GDC electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A series of LGDC are fabricated by mixing nanosized GDC powder with 1, 3, 10, 15, and 20wt% of LSB at the sintering temperature of 1300 degrees C.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of LSB-doped GDC electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The X-ray diffraction results indicate that all the LGDC electrolytes are single phase without any other impurity phases exist.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of LSB-doped GDC electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The relative density of LGDC electrolytes firstly increases and then decreases when increasing the proportion of LSB.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of LSB-doped GDC electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of 3LGDC (1.47x10(-2)Scm(-1)) is similar to 75% higher than that of GDC (8.38x10(-3)Scm(-1)) at 600 degrees C.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of LSB-doped GDC electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The maximum power density of the single cells based on 10LGDC co-fired at 1300 degrees C can reach 655mWcm(-2) at 700 degrees C.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of LSB-doped GDC electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This maximum power density is similar to 110% higher than that of the GDC-based cell.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of LSB-doped GDC electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The introduction of LSB significantly improve the open cell voltages (OCVs) of the single cells.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of LSB-doped GDC electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, the long-term stability is maintained up to more than 100h, demonstrating high stability of the LGDC electrolytes.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of LSB-doped GDC electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Hence, we trust that this LGDC electrolytes can be chosen to a promising electrolyte for high-performance IT-SOFCs.
Titulo: Preparation and properties of LSB-doped GDC electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
